Html.name: Html0
Html.content: By ${content.valueList.Paragraph} a list of CmsJspContentAccessValueWrapper objects is returned. By ${paragraph.value.Headline} and ${paragraph.value.Text} the nested values of the list elements are accessed. Just replace the .value with rdfa to get the css attributes required for inline editing. To enable the inline editing add ${paragraph.rdfa.Headline} and ${paragraph.rdfa.Text} to the HTML tag, which surround the field content:
